channel.title: Introspection on Another one bytes the Rust!
channel.description: Recent content in Introspection on Another one bytes the Rust!

item.title: My first post ... and blog
item.description: git commit? It has been a while since I wanted to make the jump and dive into the publishing my thoughts and experiments to the World Wide Web experience. However, the most likely outcome is that I be its only reader. But I’d be content with that. Still, I do believe that some of my tinkering and experimentation could be of interest for other like-minded people. I (would?) like to think it is the main reason of my going public.
